name: FGameplayCueNotify_ParticleInfo
doc:
FGameplayCueNotify_ParticleInfo

    Properties that specify how to play a particle effect.

SpawnConditionOverride: Condition to check before spawning the particle system.
PlacementInfoOverride: Defines how the particle system will be placed.
bOverrideSpawnCondition: If enabled, use the spawn condition override and not the default one.
bOverridePlacementInfo: If enabled, use the placement info override and not the default one.
bCastShadow: If enabled, this particle system will cast a shadow.
